title: 4 - Go Forth and Murder
description: The girls touch on Making A Murderer theories before delving into child killer Cropsey and the murder of Michele Wallace. Plus listener hometown stories including Adam Walsh, the girl in the box, and the Petaluma Tickler.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
